name: Cloud Jumper (Vykyng, Worldwide44, Nosonic64, AnalogueHalo, Dillon G, Nathan.Eyles, HaroldWSchranz, liririen)
name_original: Cloud Jumper (Vykyng, Worldwide44, Nosonic64, AnalogueHalo, Dillon G, Nathan.Eyles, HaroldWSchranz, liririen)
description:
Join Cloud Jumper, a sacred fox in-training, and his gluttonous, sprite companion, Kit, as they race through the sky in practice for the day that Cloud Jumper is called to the heavens to fulfill his dreams of becoming a messenger of the gods.

Designed for use in an arcade environment Cloud Jumper is a 3D Vertical Infinite Platformer where your goal is to travel as high as you can!

Built in Unity with modelling done in Maya and ZBrush, Background images hand painted (water colour) and scanned to a digital format.

Controls:
Joystick = movement Left and Right
(PC alternate control = A & D)

Button = Jump
(PC alternate control = Space Bar)

Made during End of year Assessment for the Mid Year intake as part of a collaboration with AIE Online Campus students of class '22
